antiPatterns.name: Redundant PortTypes
antiPatterns.description: A service with multiple port types that perform similar operations on the same messages.
sources: @inproceedings{palma2015study, title={A study on the taxonomy of service antipatterns}, author={Palma, Francis and Mohay, Naouel}, booktitle={Patterns Promotion and Anti-patterns Prevention (PPAP), 2015 IEEE 2nd Workshop on}, pages={5--8}, year={2015}, doi={10.1109/PPAP.2015.7076848}}
